pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Timing Identification // Identify the optimal timing for new treatment initiation during multiple state disease transition, including multistate model fitting, simulation of mean residual lifetime for a given transition state, and estimation of confidence interval. The method is referred to de Wreede, L., Fiocco, M., Putter, H. (2011) doi:10.18637/jss.v038.i07.
